text:
Sylvie Charrière (born 15 May 1961) is a French politician. She is a member of La République En Marche!. Since 2017, she has served as a member of the National Assembly for the department of Seine-Saint-Denis. She was born in Montreuil, Seine-Saint-Denis.
In March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, Charrière tested positive for COVID-19.
